greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Consider Pascal's triangle A007318; a(n) = LCM of terms at +45 degree slope with the horizontal.
comment: A025560 with an a(0) defined in addition. [From _R. J. Mathar_, Sep 23 2008]
example: The ninth diagonal is 1,7,15,10,1 and the LCM of the terms = 210 hence a(8) = 30.
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Aug 07 2002
ext: More terms from Antonio G. Astudillo (afg_astudillo(AT)lycos.com), Mar 22 2003
